name: Replenishment of War
prereq: Expert In Your Deity’s Favored Weapon
summary: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.
description:
Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity. When you damage a creature with a Strike using your deity’s favored weapon, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit.
